We are a small team of IT enthusiasts based in the United Kingdom that specialize in both software and hardware virtualization, with over 5 years of experience in providing hosting services. We opened on the 27th of April 2012 with a simple mission, to provide affordable virtualization that was both reliable and affordable.

Enterprise Xeon™ server clusters, fully redundant networking and finely tuned virtualization platforms are just some of the features that make our servers lightning fast. They look, act and most importantly, perform like a physical dedicated server and we wouldn't have it any other way.
